Issue.creator: adamludvik
Issue.description: Not much is known about this bug other than it happens sporadically when the validator is under load. Using systemd to restart the validator on failure seems to be a good bandage for this, but the issue needs to be diagnosed and resolved. The changes to test-poet-liveness in this branch cause the test to consistently reproduce this behavior, but how to generate and inspect the coredumps continues to be an open question
